questions.question: A financial services company is using SageMaker Model Monitor to track the quality of their credit scoring model. They need to evaluate the performance of the model by comparing the predicted outcomes with actual results (ground truth data) that occur after the predictions. Which feature of SageMaker Model Monitor enables this comparison?
options: Ground Truth Ingestion for Model Quality Monitoring
correct_answers: Ground Truth Ingestion for Model Quality Monitoring
questions.topic: Deployment and Orchestration of ML Workflows
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate MLA-C01
